text: HRrv 7rlv WTHTfqifereru 8419 Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (4s 4Ra6T 31   {TjATf 1A1<4) 57 Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 M National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 7-5 Ua' 6, Haer-10 , ERAT, 7} @erft-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No.11041/218/2007-Admn Dated: 12.05.2016 PQLICY MATERS-Technical (207/2016) (Decision taken in NHAI/RSC/2012/Empanelment)) Sub: Approval RFP document for  appointment of  Safety Consultants for all highway projects (BOT/HAMOMT/EPC) under NHAI. With reference to the instructions issued vide NHAI circular No_ NHAI/RSC/2O1 2/Empanelment/31 49 dated 30.05.2013, it is to inform that the RFP document for appointment of Safety Consultants has been approved by the Competent Authority which shall be applicable to all highway projects under NHAI: Accordingly, & copy of the approved RFP document is enclosed herewith for necessary action: 2 It is to mention that as per extant policy of NHAI, RO is assigned to carry out timely   procurement of  safety consultant keeping in view the status of each project. As per the RFP , the procurement shall be done online (without hard copy submission) through the e-tender portal i.e. https LInhaleprocin which shall be invited from the list of empanelled safety consultants as circulated vide NHAI policy no. 204/2016 dated 19.04.2016 (copy provided in the RFP) aS per the guidelines mentioned therein: 3 It is reiterated that as per the provisions of this RFP , a firrn   will nol be allowed to change the Team Leader personnel other than proposed at the time of empanelment; bids of those firms which propose change of Team Leader Personnel  during  negotiation shall be liable to be cancelled and the negotiation will be carried out with the next ranked applicant. Substitution of the Traffic Planner personnel will, however, be permitted on extreme grouncls viz: death Or incapacity on medical grounds, subject to equally or better qualified and experienced personnel being provided to the satisfaction of the Authority as per the requirement of RFP . 4 This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority.
